entry.title: EDUCATION
entry.summary: Harvard University Cambridge, MA Doctorate in Housing Economics Sep, 2020 – Nov, 2023 The University of Manchester Manchester, UK MSc. in Planning Sep, 2015 – Nov, 2017 National Taipei University Taipei, Taiwan B.A. in Real Estate and Built Environment Sep, 2011 – Jun, 2015
entry.content:
Harvard University                                                                              Cambridge, MA

Doctorate in Housing Economics                                                 Sep, 2020 – Nov, 2023

  • Key Modules: Gained extensive knowledge in Applied Economics, Statistics, Data Science, Casual Inference, Market Forecasting, and Predictive Modeling
  • Honors & Awards: Harvard Real Estate Grant, 2022; Fairbank Research Grant, 2021; Harvard Doctoral Scholarships, 2020

The University of Manchester                                                          Manchester, UK

MSc. in Planning                                                                                  Sep, 2015 – Nov, 2017

  • Dual Degree in Urban and Regional Planning, National Taipei University
  • Key Modules: Spatial Econometrics, Policy Analytics, Quantitative Research
  • Honors & Awards: Exceptional Thesis Award, 2017; Presidential Award*2 – top 5% students, Fall 2015 & Spring 2016

National Taipei University                                                                 Taipei, Taiwan

B.A. in Real Estate and Built Environment                                     Sep, 2011 – Jun, 2015

  • Dual Degree in Urban and Regional Planning, National Taipei University
  • Key Modules: Spatial Econometrics, Policy Analytics, Quantitative Research
  • Honors & Awards: Exceptional Thesis Award, 2017; Presidential Award*2 – top 5% students, Fall 2015 & Spring 2016

entry.title: HSUAN LO
entry.summary: Hsuan Lo is a doctoral data scientist and quantitative researcher from Harvard University, specializing in economic and market research, real estate, behavior science, and diverse data analytics. He also received statistics, modeling, AI, SQL, and data visualization training and certificates from Harvard and MIT.
entry.content: Hsuan Lo is a doctoral data scientist and quantitative researcher from Harvard University, specializing in economic and market research, real estate, behavior science, and diverse data analytics. He also received statistics, modeling, AI, SQL, and data visualization training and certificates from Harvard and MIT.
